participant_1.background:
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.
My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
I love food that is fresh and flavorful, especially if it's locally sourced.
since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.
I enjoy crocheting in my spare time.
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.

content.text: Hi! I'm a wedding planner. It's a great job, but the hours are long!
I know what you mean! I'm a wedding singer, so I'm always practicing my music and trying to get in shape for choir.
That sounds really fun! I'm not musically inclined at all.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be a lot of work too.
What's your favorite part of it?
I love getting to see the couples' faces on their wedding day. It's so special!
That sounds amazing! I'm glad you have such a great job.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to crochet and take walks in the canyon. I also love watching basketball games.
That sounds really relaxing! I love crocheting too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like.
I know what you mean! It's a lot of work, but it's so rewarding.
I agree! And it's so much fun to see your projects come together.
